question: Who reviewed the progress of Soil Health Cards Scheme & Fsasal Bima Yojana recently?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi reviewed the progress of two agriculture sector related schemes, Soil Health Cards and Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana in New Delhi. He also emphasized that soil health cards should be printed in the local dialect of the area so that the farmers are able to read and understand them easily.
